This dress was so great! I wore it on my bachelorette bar crawl. I’m 4’11” so it naturally was a little long but I sprayed some stain remover on the bottom (which was thoroughly gray after the night) and washed it gently inside out and air dried and it came out perfectly fine. Wore it again on the honeymoon.

Beautiful dress and love the little shawl that comes with it. I wore it in the deep summer so it did get a little toasty probably best for a more breezy temps but overall much better than I expected for the price.

评论详情: The quality it should be half the price
Wore this dress for my engagement pictures at the beach and honestly couldnt have been a more perfect dress.

For $50+ I thought the material would be a little bit better but whatever.  Gave it 2 stars because I only ordered this dress for the cute shawl/sleeves. But it didn’t come in the package. I read other reviews and other customers are saying they received 2 pieces. I’m really bummed I was suppose to wear to a white party in 2 days.
The item was delivered torn and the long sleeve part of the dress is so loose. Doesn’t match the dress at all. I ordered size S
This dress is so nice. It is stretchy, comfortable, good quality, and so pretty. The only downfall is that the shrug is pretty uncomfortable. I’m wearing a Medium.
This dress was great for my maternity shoot! Had a nice stretch to it. I’m 6ft and currently 170 lbs and got a size large!
Fits great and the quality is impressive too
The dress has a very pungent odor on top of that there was some sort of food particles crusted it the side of the stress. Incredibly disgusting and disappointing.

This dress was beautiful, stretchy, fitting, fit like a glove. Adjustable straps was a plus! I was not a fan of the shawl that came with the dress, not flattering. The back of the dress was not my favorite either. I did feel like I needed to wear shape wear with this dress because it is so fitting you need “shape” with this in order not to look boxy. Wearing shape wear made a world of difference when trying on! The bottom layer of the dress was constantly shifting from the top lace part this is the reason I chose a different dress to wear.

If you are shaped like the model this dress can work for you! It is not designed for hour glass women or anyone who is shaped different than the model. However with that said. If you have a body like her, please get this because it will look amazing on you! Cons: it doesn’t flatter tummy shape or hips Pro: color is beautiful

Doesn’t look bad from the chest down, but for those who are bustier it’s not going to work. It’s too tight up top and won’t give the scrunched/draped look like the photo. The cover up is cheap and useless. The material seems like it’s in the cheaper side, but it’s ok for the body. If you have a heavier chest you’ll notice the cheapness in the straps as they’ll stretch out. Wouldn’t wear this in the colder months the static was causing the lace overlay to ride up which definitely added to the cheap look. This one was a flop.
I am 5’3” and a size large this dress was perfect and fit in all the right places!!

Obsessed wit this dress. Wore this for a bridal shower and was perfect! Hugs the body just right. Very flattering of curves. Stretches nicely. The lace shrug doesn’t have quite as much stretch. Down a star because one seam did tear fairly easily the first time I wore it but wasn’t super noticeable and I think I can mend easily. Looks so much more expensive.

I think this dress would be a great option for a photoshoot or event where you might get a little dirty. The price was good, and I only needed it to wear under a skirt for an outdoor event in Ireland. The lace cover was a bonus that I ended up using when taking photographs in just the dress by itself because it wasn't very warm out. It was thin like a slip, and I wore it as such, and even though it is described as being a formal gown, I would not have been happy if this was the only thing I was wearing. It was already torn on one side right out of the bag, and when I went to adjust it for one of the photos, it tore again. The straps are adjustable, but still very thin. Again, this would be the perfect gown for something you might expect to get dirty or wet in, and I can imagine it would photograph well.

I was excited to get this dress, but when I opened it the zipper was down and it had to rips in the back and front as if someone wore it before me. Which is gross. Honestly, quality is cheap looking. So I’m glad I’m returning it.

I'm 5"3 140lbs and ordered a medium, honestly could have worn a small so the arms stayed on a little better - but the fabric is stretchy while staying form fitting. So so pretty in person, people couldn't believe I got it from Amazon!
Loved this dress for my rehearsal dinner
Gorgeous dress my husband loves it!!

Good dupe dress for house of CB. Dress was little more pink than shown but I'm okay with it. Has good stretch and is comfy. I'm 5'2 and size small was perfect fit and length. Keep in mind, house of CB dress has a back lace up corset vs this one is smocked in the back.
Love love love this dress. If you’re between sizes  size down!
I wanted to like it and the concept is very cute I just think it’s the nude fabric underneath that I didn’t like. Fits body nicely. True to size.

ditched the sleeves (they’re not attached to the dress) and wore it to a summer wedding, it was was about 95 in CA and I was very comfortable the whole time. dress is breathable and easy to move in and I got a ton of compliments the whole night. I’m 5’7 and have a bit of a tummy and the dress was very flattering. 10/10

Dress had multiple rips . Super disappointed ! I returned it .

The material it’s made out of is uncomfortable, it’s not itchy, but it’s kinda restricting. The layers of the dress were also really weird because there’s a scrunch on the side where the lace layer and the layer underneath are sewn together, but ONLY on one side. So one side was fitted but the other side would fall down. The way it was layered just didn’t work in general, you have to constantly readjust the dress for it to look good.
Hey yall! This dress was so pretty I had to leave a review ! I am 5’7 and 130 POUNDS and I got a size SMALL! I fits PERFECTLY AND you can adjust the straps !

Needs tailoring on the shawl.  everything else on the dress fits amazingly I would throw a few stitches in the front to hold together the lace and under slip on the chest so the lace doesn’t move around but that’s about it wearing it for my wedding dress
Very beautiful dress! Unfortunately the lace of the dress didn’t sit right and pulled in odd areas so had to return.

I changed into this dress before leaving my wedding reception. It is super comfortable and not itchy. The little shrug was too small for me but that didnt stop me from rocking this dress! Got many compliments on it from our wedding guests. It fits true to size.

I spent hundredsssss of dollars buying and trying dresses for my bridal shower. I had no idea how hard it would be to find a white dress that wasn’t see through. I kept scrolling past this dress but figured the quality wouldn’t be great considering the price. 5 days before my shower, I figured I had nothing to lose. I was prepared to wear a black dress at that point. Turns out, this was the one! The first one that came had a small hole in the back on the lace layer. Amazon replaced it quickly, I got the replacement the next day and it was perfect. My cat ended up pulling it off my dresser while I wasn’t home so it sat in a pile on the ground for a couple hours and didn’t wrinkle at all. The only thing I didn’t love was the back - it’s the stretchy tube top material. But my hair is so long that it covered most of it. Otherwise it was absolutely perfect. The inner layer is nude colored so no chance of translucence. I got so many compliments. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a bridal shower dress that makes you look snatched for less than $50! I ordered a size small - 5’5” with 3 inch heels, 125lbs. I normally wear a size 4-6.
Love this dress! It fits like a glove and feels super comfy. Overall a great buy!
The perfect dress for my gazebo elopement 🤍😋. I’m 5”3 and 144 pounds. Medium was a perfect fit and the material was not itchy.
Such a pretty dress and so flattering! I got it for my bridal shower but ended up going with a different dress, going to wear the night before the wedding instead!
So excited for this product. Showed up to my door and unboxed it looked around on the dress to see how it looked before putting it on found two big rips on very noticeable places.
I’m 5’1 130-140lbs and I didn’t need to alter it or anything I loved it I used it for my sisters quinceñera. The little sweater thing was ugly on me  didn’t use that haha

Absolutely LOVED this dress! I wore it for my bridal shower and got a ton of compliments! It fit like a glove and was a stretchy material so I didn’t feel restricted. My favorite part was the lace shawl thing, SO pretty!
cheap fabric doesn’t look like the picture at all it has a nude color underneath and looks so bad.
I like it so much good quality 👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼

This runs small. Usual size is lg. The lg in this dress is a little tight. Cheaply made.  Has a little stretch but suggest sizing up. The lace jacket does not stretch. Length stops at or above ankles. Would be better if it was longer and a little better quality.
It looked like a costume and sizing definitely runs small.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower and received ao many compliments on it! The quality is great and the sleeves are beautiful.
I bought this for engagement photos, and it truly lived up to the standard! Very nice quality and comfortable!

Not sure if this is a great dupe for the designer dress, BUT this dress is absolutely beautiful! The lace looks really elegant and it hangs perfectly. It’s very stretchy so sizing is generous. I took a small and am usually a S/M. (Shrug that goes with it not pictured; doubt I’ll use it)

I loved the silhouette, comfort, light weight, and fit. I did not like that the two layers (lace and slip) do not hold onto each other. The seam across the chest rolls because the layers are not attached to one another. It creates a shelf that would be very obvious in photos and would have been personally distracting. The jacket is so stinkin cute and the arms fit. It requires too much tailoring in my opinion. The recommended size was too large IMO. I returned it.
Such a comfortable dress. The little lace “jacket” was too small but other than that fits like a glove.
I wore this dress for my engagement pictures and it felt so good on my skin and hugged in all the right places. My favorite dress 🙂‍↕️
Loved this dress!! Wasn't sure about the nudes underneath but it was actually perfect!

The dress fits well to my form, I do wish it was a tad bit longer. I am 5’7 and weigh 140lb. I was worried a Small wouldn’t fit however it’s perfect sizing. It’s not to think or thin and is fairly comfortable. I can move in the dress without it feeling like it’ll snap. I think the quality is really nice for the price and it looks great. An amazing dupe.

Is it the real thing as house of CB absolutely not. And the photos they have on this listing are screenshots from house of CB photoshopped change the back to what they’re selling. It’s not the same. It’s not padded and it’s not super duper high quality. But… I think I look pretty good and I think it looks decent! I don’t really like corset backs so I’m happy this one isn’t the same as the dress it’s nocking off. All in all… if you’re looking for a perfect dupe this isn’t it. If you’re looking for a beautiful dress that won’t break the bank, go  ahead and get this. (Also the sleeve, shawl thing is awful and way too loose. Could be tailored tho. Looks like a grandma shawl but I wasn’t planning to wear it anyways so I don’t care that much)

The style of this dress is SO flattering. I ordered this dress because it looked like a house of CB dress with a hefty price tag.. this one was definitely worth the money! It’s so detailed and elegant, therefore it was a perfect addition to my bridal wardrobe. It did fit true to size but was stretchy so I exchanged it for a medium.
